name: idbc-issue-147
description: Prototype for reproducing bug described in idb-connector issue 147

scripts.compile-rpg: system -kbieps "crtbndrpg pgm(PISSUE147) srcstmf('"$(pwd)"/src/rpg/pissue147.rpgle') replace(*no) usrprf(*owner) optimize(*none) dbgview(*all) option(*xref *showcpy *expdds *ext *showskp *srcstmt *unref *eventf)"
scripts.compile: npm run compile-rpg && npm run compile-rpg-sql && npm run create-sql-table && npm run compile-ts
